article_metadata.description: Tuesday meetingKEY ACTION  Recognized district Treasurer Jeff Bartholomew and his staff for receiving the Auditor of State award for a recent "clean" audit.DISCUSSION  The audit for fiscal year 2015 was recently completed by the state and there were no findings. Bartholomew said the award is a reflection of the entire staff because they are following procedures that were put in place by his department. The Auditor of State award is presented to districts that have met criteria of
